markdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody:
# MEV Reading List
> Some good reads on miner extractable value (MEV)

## Introduction
On my leave of absence from my graduate program, I've decided to catch up on some new technical concepts and do a lot of programming. One of the most interesting developments over the past few years is how much attention crypto has been getting, which plenty of my friends have started to get involved with (my usual signal to start reading about a topic).

From a machine learning background, I really enjoy the adversarial nature of blockchain dynamics and coming off of a quantitative trading gig, I've found **miner extractable value** an interesting area to read about.

## Flashboys 2.0

## "Ethereum Is A Dark Forest"

## Synthetix Strategy

## Conclusion
